x_axis.title: Use first column as x-axis
x_axis.description: When selected, the first data column will be used for the x-axis. Otherwise, all columns of the data are considered parallel y-axes, and the x-axis on the figure will be the index.

truncate.title: Truncate history points
truncate.description: When selected, will only keep up to a certain number of data points. Otherwise, will keep all history.

history_len.title: Maximum number of history points to keep

enable_axis_limits.title: Limit plotting to a defined range
enable_axis_limits.description: When selected, plotting will be confined to the specified range. If not selected, the range will adjust based on the plot's data.
